GS41yogay1_u:1.1ab: yasminn udayati vikasati kamalam ivāstaṃ prayāti saṃkucati/
GS41yogay1_u:1.1cd: sacarācaraṃ tribhuvanaṃ sa jayati kiraṇālayaḥ savitā//
GS41yogay1_u:1.2ab: yakṣeśamedhena vijitya dhātrīm ity evam abhyudyamino nṛpasya/
GS41yogay1_u:1.2cd: vinighnato vighnakarān na pāpaṃ kriyāt krameṇaiva paśūn makheṣu//
GS41yogay1_u:1.3cd: prajānurakto dhṛtimān sahiṣṇur vṛddhopasevī vijigīṣur iṣṭaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:1.4ab: sāmvatsaras tasya vinītaveṣo dhīmān svatantrāṅgapaṭuḥ kulīnaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:1.4cd: dakṣaḥ pragalbho 'vikalo vinītas tādṛg vidhastasya purohito 'pi//
GS41yogay1_u:1.5cd: tatra kecid avadhūya nṛkāraṃ daivam eva phaladāyakam āhuḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:1.6ab: labdhavyāny eva labhyate gantavyāny eva gacchati/
GS41yogay1_u:1.6cd: prāptavyāny eva prāproti duḥkhāni ca sukhāni ca//
GS41yogay1_u:1.7ab: utthānāc ced bhavet siddhir na kaścit prāpnuyāt phalam/
GS41yogay1_u:1.9ab: tasmād daivaṃ pradhānaṃ hi na kuryāt karma mānuṣam/
GS41yogay1_u:1.9cd: niśceṣṭam api loke 'smin bhajate bhuktir uttamā//
GS41yogay1_u:1.10ab: āghātadurjayanayaṃ paribhūya daivam ātmābhimānacapalāḥ pracaranti ye 'rīn/
GS41yogay1_u:1.10cd: teṣāṃ cirād api kṛtāntamahāpaśūnāṃ hastagrahaṃ na samupaiti jitāpi lakṣmī//
GS41yogay1_u:1.12ab: utthānahīno rājā hi buddhimān api sarvadā/
GS41yogay1_u:1.16ab: na vinā mānuṣaṃ daivaṃ daivaṃ vā mānuṣaṃ vinā/
GS41yogay1_u:1.17cd: daivāt purusakārāc ca na tv ekasmāt kathājcana//
GS41yogay1_u:1.19ab: yatnena sampadya manuṣyakāraṃ yatnāvakāśe puruṣo niruddhaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:1.19cd: pratīkṣate daivamataṃ dvitīyas tam āpado nātmakṛtāḥ spṛśanti//
GS41yogay1_u:1.20cd: kṛcchreṇa śeṣaṃ mahatā yato 'to bhājyāni mṛgyāṇi nṛbhir chap.2 tithiguṇa
GS41yogay1_u:2.1a: yātrākālam ataḥ paraṃ munimatāny ālokya saṃkhyāpayā-
GS41yogay1_u:2.1c: jñāte janmani tasya yānasamayaṃ vāṃchanti horāvidas
GS41yogay1_u:2.1d: tv ajñāte 'py aphaleṣu nākṣaram iva prāhātra ratnāvalim//
GS41yogay1_u:2.2cd: āyuṣi ca parijñāte śubham aśubhaṃ vā phalaṃ vācyam//
GS41yogay1_u:2.4ab: apṛcchataḥ pṛcchato vā yiyāsor yasya kasya cit/
GS41yogay1_u:2.6ab: aśrauṣīc ca purā viṣṇor jñānārthaṃ samupasthitaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:2.7ab: yat sāraṃ pṛcchataḥ puṃso graharā(śyā)śritaṃ phalam/
GS41yogay1_u:2.7cd: tatsāraṃ tasya janma syād ya(dya)py anyagṛhe bhavet//
GS41yogay1_u:2.10c: sad iti sadasi vācyaṃ yady api syād asat tat
GS41yogay1_u:2.10d: sphuṭam pai kathanīyaṃ bhūbhuje mantriṇe vā//
GS41yogay1_u:2.13a: udayam udayapaṃ vā janmabhaṃ janmapaṃ vā
GS41yogay1_u:2.13b: tad upacayagṛhaṃ vā vīkṣya lagne yiyāsoḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:2.13c: vinihatam aripakṣaṃ viddhi śatror idaṃ vā
GS41yogay1_u:2.14ab: pārṣṇigrāhaḥ pṛṣṭhato bhāskarasya prāg yātavyastigmaraśmeś ca yānaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:2.14cd: ākrandārkāt saptame yaḥ sthitaś ca tattulyāste śaktitaś cintayīyāḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:2.15b: siddhārtho 'rigaṇān vijitya na cirāt praṣṭā sametyālayam/
GS41yogay1_u:2.15c: lagne vā kujamandayoḥ sutagate jīve ravau karmage
GS41yogay1_u:2.15d: lābhe karmaṇi vā sitendusutayoḥ praṣṭur jayo niścitaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:2.16ab: tasminn eva bhaved yoge yadi śukro 'ṣṭam āśritaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:2.16cd: praṣṭāram udyamād eva hataśaktir viśasty ariḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:2.18cd: caturthe jñe 'ṣṭame candre jāyāsthe ca site jayaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:2.19cd: candre ṣaṣṭhe vilagnasthaiḥ śeṣaiḥ praṣṭurdhruvo jayaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:2.20cd: gurau vā lagnage pāpair lābhe karmaṇi vā sthitaiḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:2.22ab: ity yogāḥ śubhāḥ proktāḥ praśnakāle jayāśritāḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:2.22cd: aśubhās tu bhavanty atra tān pravakṣyāmy ataḥ param//
GS41yogay1_u:2.24ab: savakre nidhane mande mṛtyur lagne divākare/
GS41yogay1_u:2.24cd: candre 'smin tryāyamṛtyusthe sasūrye vā vaded vadham//
GS41yogay1_u:2.30cd: tadvan mandārayor yuddhe bhaṅgaḥ saumyārkayos tathā//
GS41yogay1_u:2.31ab: sarvais tu navame rājā hanti mantripurohitān/
GS41yogay1_u:2.32cd: candre 'ste vibalaiḥ saumyaiḥ praṣṭuḥ senāpater vadhaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:2.33cd: jñe tṛtīye ca vikramya samantrī hanyate nṛpaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:2.35d: sadasad idam aśeṣaṃ yānakāle 'pi cintyam//E35 chap.3 titiguṇa
GS41yogay1_u:3.1ab: nandā bhadrā vijayāś cātha riktāḥ pūrṇāś caitāḥ phalam evaṃ vidadhyuḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:3.1cd: neṣṭā madhyā pravarāś ceti śukle kṛṇṇe cintyās tithayas tāḥ pratīpāḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:3.2ab: sarvāḥ śastās tithayaḥ śuklapakṣe hitvā tryṃśaṃ bahule 'ntyaṃ ca kaiścit/
GS41yogay1_u:3.2cd: ṣaṣṭhyaṣṭamyor vasulabdhāpi yātā dvādaśyāṃ vā nāśam āśu prayāti//
GS41yogay1_u:3.3ab: pratipadi phalam eke pañcadaśyāṃ ca neṣṭaṃ jagur idam iti tajjñair yāpyam evāvadhāryam/
GS41yogay1_u:3.3cd: kim api kim api nūnaṃ taiḥ samīkṣyoktam etat samavacanavighāte yuktatā kena cintyā//E3 chap.4 nakṣatrabala
GS41yogay1_u:4.1c: surapatir api kṛcchraṃ yāti taṃ laṃghayitvā
GS41yogay1_u:4.2ab: prāgdvārikair analadiṅ na virodham eti śeṣāḥ pradakṣiṇagatāḥ vidiśaḥ prakalpyāḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:4.2cd: ullaṃghya daṇḍam api kāmam iyān narendraḥ śūlaṃ vihāya yadi diṅmukhalagnaśuddhiḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:4.3b: yāmyām ājapade muraś calitavān yāto murārer vaśam/
GS41yogay1_u:4.3c: rohiṇyāṃ namuciḥ pratīcy abhigataḥ pūrtiṃ gato vajriṇā
GS41yogay1_u:4.3d: saumyām aryamadaivate ca gatavān mṛtyor vaśaṃ śambaraḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:4.4ab: puṣyo 'tha hastaḥ śravaṇaḥ śraviṣṭhā prācyādimukhyāny udag aśviyuk ca/
GS41yogay1_u:4.4cd: naiśākaraṃ tvāṣṭram athānurādhā pauṣṇaṃ ca madhyāni tathāhur eke//
GS41yogay1_u:4.6a: sve sve karmaṇi pūjitāni munibhiḥ śuddhāni sarvāṇy api
GS41yogay1_u:4.6c: rohiṇyāṃ triṣu cottareṣu vijayo yātur viśākhāsu ca
GS41yogay1_u:4.7c: rātryādau tu na pauṣṇamaitraśaśibhatvāṣṭreṣu vāṃchan dyutiṃ
GS41yogay1_u:4.7d: rātrer madhyam apāsya pūrvabharaṇīpitryeṣu hantuṃ parāḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:4.8ab: niśāntabhāge triṣu vaiṣṇavādyeṣv iyād dhanārthī na punarvasau ca/
GS41yogay1_u:4.9cd: kṛtvā prayāṇaṃ śravaṇe śriyo 'rthī viśen na jātuḥ kṣitipaḥ svasīmni//
GS41yogay1_u:4.10ab: saumye gatvādhyuṣya raudre 'ditīśe saṃprasthātā bādhate śatrusaṃghān/
GS41yogay1_u:4.10cd: maitre gatvā pauruhūte samuṣya? mūle yāyāc chatrunāśāya bhūpaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:4.11ab: haste gatvā svāticitre samuṣya śakrāgnyṛkṣe prasthito bādhate 'rīn/
GS41yogay1_u:4.11cd: tiṣye pauṣṇe vāsave caikarātraṃ sīmni sthitvā bhūtim āpnoti yātā//
GS41yogay1_u:4.12ab: ṛkṣe pāpaiḥ saṃyute 'ntaḥ prakopo lakṣmībhraṃśo rāhuṇārkeṇa rogaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:4.12cd: ketūlkābhyāṃ pīḍite deśanāśaḥ kleśaḥ saure soṣṇaraśmyātmaje ca// athānayagadaśramarogapīḍāḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:4.13cd: bhinne graheṇa vaśatām upayāti śatroḥ sandhyārātre 'śanihate 'javighāta uktaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:4.14ab: janmādi karma tato dṛśan na(va)maṃ saṃghātikaṃ coḍubhāgam/
GS41yogay1_u:4.15ab: ādyāt tu paṃcaviṃśaṃ mānasametaṃ naraḥ ṣaḍṛkṣaḥ syāt/
GS41yogay1_u:4.20cd: toyaiḥ snātvā nṛpatir yāyād yāmyāṃ diśaṃ haste//
GS41yogay1_u:4.24ab: akṣatamāṣāḥ khinnās tilasahitās taṇḍulā dadhi ca gavyam/
GS41yogay1_u:4.26ab: prāśyāḥ priyaṅgucitrāṇḍajāḥ phalaṃ yāvakaṃ kulatthāś ca/
GS41yogay1_u:4.26cd: madhusarpiṣī ca hastān mūlāny ambūni saktavo mūlāt//
GS41yogay1_u:4.27ab: śravaṇādīnām adyāc chāliṃ śākaṃ biḍālamāṃsaṃ ca/
GS41yogay1_u:4.28ab: prāśyādi ghṛtaṃ tilaudanaṃ matsyāḥ kṣīram iti pradakṣiṇam/
GS41yogay1_u:4.28cd: adyān nṛpatir yathādiśaṃ nakṣatrābhihitaṃ ca siddhaye//
GS41yogay1_u:4.29ab: asvādu cyutakacamakṣikānuviddhaṃ durgandhi kṣayakṛd abhūri yac ca dagdham/
GS41yogay1_u:4.29cd: susvinnaṃ mudu ruciraṃ manonukūlaṃ svādvannaṃ bahu vijayāya yānakāle//
GS41yogay1_u:4.30a: guṇavati tithāv ṛkṣe 'niṣṭe divā gamanaṃ hitaṃ
GS41yogay1_u:4.30b: niśi ca bhagane śastaṃ yānaṃ tithau guṇavarjite/
GS41yogay1_u:4.30d: guṇam api tayoḥ samyag yātur jagāda bhṛgur muniḥ//E30 chap.5 vāraphala
GS41yogay1_u:5.1cd: anilakaphajarogān śaktimānānnahāniṃ salilajanitapīḍāṃ cāhni yātā himāṃśoḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:5.2cd: ahani savitṛsūnor dainyam āpnoti gacchan svajanadhanaviyogaṃ mṛtyubandhāmayāṃś
GS41yogay1_u:5.3ab: budhadivasagato 'rīn bādhate mantraśaktyā sravaṇasukhakathāptiṃ śilpimitrāgamāṃś ca/
GS41yogay1_u:5.3cd: kṣitidhanajayaratnastrīpratāpapramodān atibalam acireṇa svīkaroty ahni sūreḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:5.4cd: anupacayagato 'haḥ śastam apy apraśastaṃ śubham upacayasaṃsthaḥ pāpasaṃjño vidhatte//E4 chap.6 muhūrta
GS41yogay1_u:6.1cd: garam api kaiś cic chastaṃ vaṇijaṃ ca vaṇikkriyāsv eva/
GS41yogay1_u:6.4ab: ahnaḥ pañcadaśāṃśo rātreś caivaṃ muhūrta iti saṃjñā//
GS41yogay1_u:6.4cd: sa ca vijñeyas tajjñaiś chāyāyantrāmbubhir yuktyā//
GS41yogay1_u:6.5ab: nakṣatravat kṣaṇānaṃ parighādi tadīśvaraiḥ samaṃ cintyaṃ/
GS41yogay1_u:6.5cd: phalam api tad eva dṛṣṭaṃ gargādyais tatra ca ślokāḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:6.7ab: aṣṭame 'rdhadivase same śubho yo viriñcavibhusaṃjñitaḥ kṣaṇaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:6.7cd: tena yānam apahāya dakṣiṇāṃ sarvadikṣv abhijitā praśasyate//E7 chap.7 candrabala
GS41yogay1_u:7.1ab: satya āha gatikarmakalpahā janmagas tu himaguryiyāsataḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:7.1cd: tatra dehanavate 'vajāyate tena karmasu na sādhakaḥ smṛtaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:7.2ab: tac ca tasya bahubhir viśodhitaṃ lagnam eva sutarāṃ yatas tanuḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:7.2cd: tulyadehanavatāṃ prapadya kiṃ sodayodayam uvāca śobhanam//
GS41yogay1_u:7.3cd: janmago 'pi hi tadā praśasyate yo 'ṣṭavargaśubhadaḥ sa śobhanaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:7.5ab: yasya gocaraphalapramāṇatā tasya vedhaphalam iṣyate na vā/
GS41yogay1_u:7.5cd: prāyaśo na bahusaṃmataṃ tv idaṃ sthūlamārgaphalado hi gocaraḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:7.6ab: yasyotsṛjaty uḍupatiḥ puruṣo 'pasavyaṃ janmarkṣam āpadam upaiti sa bhūmipālaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:7.6cd: yāyī tathetaragṛhopagate sitādau yāyītareś varajayo bahule kṣayaś ca//
GS41yogay1_u:7.7ab: horārāśāv upacayagṛhe janmabhe vā yiyāsor hānir hānāv uḍugaṇapatau vṛddhir āpūryamāṇe/
GS41yogay1_u:7.7cd: pakṣasy ādāv apacayagṛhe hānir āpūryamāṇe vṛddhis tūktā hrasati himagau kṛṣṇapakṣādisaṃsthe//
GS41yogay1_u:7.8ab: upacayagṛhayuktaḥ savyagaḥ śuklapakṣe śubham abhilaṣamāṇaḥ saumyamadhyasthito vā/
GS41yogay1_u:7.8cd: sakhivaśigṛhayuktaḥ kārakarkṣe 'pi cendur jayasukhaphaladātā tatprahartāny athātaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:7.9ab: prakṣīṇe 'pya anupacayasthite 'pe yāyād viśrabdhaṃ yadi sakhivaśyakārakarkṣe/
GS41yogay1_u:7.9cd: naivaṃ ced udayagṛhāt svajanmabhād vā sampūrṇe 'py upacayage 'pi na prayāyāt//
GS41yogay1_u:7.10ab: bhṛgusutabudhabhinne ruk sureḍyena mṛtyur bhayam asitakujābhyāṃ ketunā strīpraṇāśaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:7.10cd: apaṭukiraṇakāntau gacchataḥ śatruvṛddhiḥ savikṛtapariveṣe netranāśaḥ śaśāṅke//E10 chap.8 lagnabala
GS41yogay1_u:8.1ab: dvipadavaśagāḥ sarve siṃhaṃ vihāya catuṣpadāḥ salilanilayābharkṣāvaśyāḥ sarīsṛpajātayaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:8.1cd: mṛgapativaśe tiṣṭhanty ete vihāya sarīsṛpān na kathitagṛheṣūhyaṃ vaśyaṃ janavyavahārataḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:8.2ab: sthalajalajasarīsṛpāḥ svakānāṃ balam abhivīkṣya vidheyatāṃ bhajante/
GS41yogay1_u:8.2cd: viṣamagṛhavaśe samā dyusaṃsthā niśi viṣamā vaśavartinaḥ samānām//
GS41yogay1_u:8.3ab: śīrṣodaye samabhivāṃchitakāryasiddhiḥ pṛṣṭhodaye viphalatāṃ balavidravaś ca/
GS41yogay1_u:8.3cd: yātavyadiṅmukhagatasya sukhena siddhir vyarthaśramo bhavati dikpratilomalagen//
GS41yogay1_u:8.4ab: śastaṃ divā dinabale niśi naktavīrye rāśau viparyayabale gamanaṃ na śastam/
GS41yogay1_u:8.5ab: mīnodaye pravasataḥ kuṭilaḥ sadoṣo mārge bhavaty akṛtakāryanivartanam ca/
GS41yogay1_u:8.5cd: anyāṃśakeṣv api jhaṣe phalam etad eva mīnāṃśakeṣu ca pararkṣasamāśriteṣu//
GS41yogay1_u:8.6ab: ripunidhane ripunidhanaṃ ripuṣaṣṭhe lagnage vadho yātuḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:8.7ab: śatroḥ prasūtisamaye yadi nidhanaṃ saṃyutaṃ grahaiḥ pāpaiḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:8.7cd: saumyayutaṃ vā ṣaṣṭhaṃ sadasatphalatā tatas tābhyām//
GS41yogay1_u:8.8ab: kleśād vinā phalam arikṣayam arthasiddhiṃ prāpnoti lagnasahite pravasan svalagne/
GS41yogay1_u:8.8cd: arthakṣayaṃ śramamanarthamato dvitīye kalyāṇasaukhyavibhavāgamam āhur eke//
GS41yogay1_u:8.10ab: dyūne 'dhvavāhanavipatkṣudatiśramārtir bandho vadhaḥ paribhavo nidhane rujaś ca/
GS41yogay1_u:8.10cd: dharme 'rthanāśagadakāryavipadbhayāni kāryaṃ vinā balabhayaṃ daśame kṣayaś ca//
GS41yogay1_u:8.11ab: kecid vadanty upacayopagṛhītam etat tasmāc chubhaṃ daśamabhe gamanaṃ vilagen/
GS41yogay1_u:8.11cd: arthāptidīptiśubhasiddhijayāś ca lābhe ripphe chalaṃ vyaaybhaye vijite 'pi bhedaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:8.12b: dyūne kleśam avāpya janmabhavanāt prāpnoti paścāt sukham/
GS41yogay1_u:8.12d: śeṣarkṣeṣu yathaiva lagnabhavanāt tadvat phalaṃ janmataḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:8.13cd: śastā cāndre devatārthaṃ svadeśe kauje pittavyālaśastrāgnipīḍā//
GS41yogay1_u:8.14ab: baudhe tuṣṭir vāṃchitāptir yaśaś ca jaive 'thāptiḥ sthānamānārināśāḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:8.14cd: strīratnāptiḥ kāryasiddhiś ca śaukre mānde bandhavyādhinīcāvamānāḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:8.15ab: saumyo 'pi janmani na yaḥ śubhapuṣṭidātā sthānaṃ na tasya śubhadaṃ vrajato vilagen/
GS41yogay1_u:8.15cd: pāpo 'pi yaḥ śubhaphalaṃ prakaroti puṃsāṃ sthānaṃ vilagnagatam iṣṭam uśanti tasya//
GS41yogay1_u:8.18ab: kecid vadanti yasmin graho niraṃśaṃ karoti tallagnam/
GS41yogay1_u:8.19ab: vṛṣavṛścikakarkaṭair nṛṇām anukūlair api lagnam āśritaiḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:8.20ab: veśirvilagnopagato yiyāsor vināpi yatnāt kurute phalāptim/
GS41yogay1_u:8.20cd: gauyānam iṣṭaṃ jalarāśilagne tad aṃśake cānyagṛhodaye 'pi//E20 chap.9 lagnabheda
GS41yogay1_u:9.1ab: ūrdhvā tiryag vānatā syāc ca horā muktā krāntā nāgatārkā krameṇa/
GS41yogay1_u:9.1cd: ity etāḥ syur jīvaśarmopadeśe jñeyo rāśir brahmaṣaṇḍasya pakṣe//
GS41yogay1_u:9.2ab: ūrdhvā syād yā ṣaṭcarādyeṣu horā bhūyo bhūyo maṇḍale kaiścid uktā/
GS41yogay1_u:9.2cd: rāśau rāśau prāgvilagnopayātaiḥ drekkāṇais tu prāha horāṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:9.3ab: sarvaṃ pramāṇaṃ municoditatvāt kiṃ tv atra yojyaṃ dalam eva horā/
GS41yogay1_u:9.3cd: yasmin sahasrāṃśuravasthito 'rdhe tiryaṅmukhī sā gaṇaye tato 'nyāḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:9.4a: dhatte vāṃchitakāryam ūrdhvavadanā kleśād vinā lagnagā
GS41yogay1_u:9.4c: sainyabhraṃśam adhomukhī prakurute kṛcchrād gṛhe cāgamaṃ BY_9.4d/.srvāḥ puṣṭaphalapradāḥ svapatinā dṛṣṭā na pāpagrahaiḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:9.5ab: grahadivasaphalaṃ yad eva yātur tad akhilam eva karoti tasya horā/
GS41yogay1_u:9.6c: saumyair dṛṣṭe jayaḥ syāt praharaṇasahite pāpadṛṣṭe ca bhaṅgaḥ
GS41yogay1_u:9.6d: sāgnau dāho 'tha bandhaḥ sabhujaganigale pāśayukte ca yātuḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:9.7ab: nṛpabhūrtir lagnagate drekkāṇe mantriṇo dvitīye ca/
GS41yogay1_u:9.10ab: jñeyaṃ balaṃ prayātur mantrasya viniścayaś ca tatparatah/
GS41yogay1_u:9.12cd: sainyārogyaṃ sainyaṃ catuṣpadaṃ ca kramāt tritaye//
GS41yogay1_u:9.13ab: kāryaṃ kośaḥ phalasiddhayas traye bhūmipās traye parataḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:9.14ab: ity udayādyā bhāvā drekkāṇair ye mayā samuddiṣṭāḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:9.17ab: yad udayati phalaṃ grahe pradiṣṭaṃ janayati tasya navāṃśako vlagne/
GS41yogay1_u:9.17cd: subhabhavananavāṃśe sahāyo ripubalabhāgam upaiti yātur atra//
GS41yogay1_u:9.18ab: yat proktaṃ rāśy udaye dvādaśabhāge 'pi tat phalaṃ vācyam/
GS41yogay1_u:9.18cd: yac ca navāṃśakavihitaṃ triṃśāṃśasyodaye tat syāt//E18 chap.10 grahasthānabala
GS41yogay1_u:10.2cd: dyūne kalatrakalahaṃ dhanasaṃkṣayaṃ ca mṛtyuṃ karoti nidhane savitā rujaṃ ca//
GS41yogay1_u:10.3ab: dharmaṃ hinasti navame savitārthadaś ca hatvā viyatyaviditaṃ śramakarmadātā/
GS41yogay1_u:10.3cd: ratnāgamaṃ subahu lābhagataḥ karoti kṛtvā vyayaṃ vyayagataḥ kurute 'rtham alpam//
GS41yogay1_u:10.4ab: lagne śaśī kalahaśokakaro na pūrṇaḥ strīvājiratnasuhṛdātmajadaḥ kuṭumbe/
GS41yogay1_u:10.4cd: duścikyago yuvatiratnadhanapradātā bandhvāptidaḥ suhṛdi tatkṣayadaś ca kṛṣṇe//
GS41yogay1_u:10.5ab: arthapradas tanayagaḥ sutaśokakṛc ca mitrāritāṃ prakurute na sukhaṃ ca ṣaṣṭhe/
GS41yogay1_u:10.6ab: pratyeti cāśu navame kurute ca kāryaṃ kṣīṇe kṣayo viyati vṛddhirato 'nyathāsthe/
GS41yogay1_u:10.6cd: aiśvaryasaukhyadhanalābham upaite lābhe kleśakṣayavyayabhayāni ca riṣphayāte//
GS41yogay1_u:10.7ab: lagne viṣāgnirudhirāgamaśastrabādhā bhindyād balaṃ dhanagato 'rthakaraś ca paścāt/
GS41yogay1_u:10.8ab: putāpadaṃ kṣitisutaḥ kurute sutasthaḥ śatrupraṇāśam acirād arigaḥ karoti/ bandhārthahānigadamṛtyubhayāni mṛtyau//
GS41yogay1_u:10.9ab: dharmaṃ na sādhayati dharmagato mahījaḥ śasto 'mbare na śubhadaḥ kathito 'pariś
GS41yogay1_u:10.9cd: lābhe 'rthasiddhivibhavāgamadaḥ prayātur vittakṣayaṃ bahu karoti gataś ca riṣphe//
GS41yogay1_u:10.10b: sotkaṇṭhaṃ sa virāgameti sahaje kāmān labhetākhilān/
GS41yogay1_u:10.10d: ṣaṣṭhe yāty aribādhyatāṃ śaśisute kleśaś ca yātur bhavet//
GS41yogay1_u:10.11b: kecit kleśam uśanti naidhanagate śaṃsanti kecic chubham/
GS41yogay1_u:10.11c: dharme dharmavivṛddhir ambaragate siddhir bhaved īpsitā
GS41yogay1_u:10.11d: vidyārthāptir ayatnataś ca parato riṣphe ca vācyo vyayaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:10.12ab: kīrtir lagne 'rthāthasiddhir dvitīye duścikyasthe kṣucchramārtiḥ surejye/
GS41yogay1_u:10.12cd: pātālasthe dharmatatvābhimānā kāryaṃ sidhyaty ātmajasthe 'py asādhyam//
GS41yogay1_u:10.13ab: ṣaṣṭhe jīve śatrurāyāti vaśyaṃ kecit prāhur vaśyatāṃ yāti śatroḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:10.13cd: vindanty aste 'riṣṭayoṣāyaśāṃsi mṛtyau prāṇān hanty athānye jagur na//
GS41yogay1_u:10.14ab: putrotpattir dharmasiddhiś ca dharme jīve karmaṇy arthasiddhir yaśaś ca/
GS41yogay1_u:10.14cd: lābhe kāryaṃ vāñchitaṃ yāti siddhiḥ riṣphe prāpte kliśyate 'nekaduḥkhaiḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:10.15b: lābho 'rthe sahaje na sīdati gataḥ prāpnoti śreṣṭhāṃ śrutim/
GS41yogay1_u:10.16d: vyarthaṃ dvādaśago vyayaṃ prakurute śasto 'parair dvādaśe//
GS41yogay1_u:10.17ab: bandhaṃ vadhaṃ cārkasute vilagne dhane arthahāniṃ labhate śubhaṃ ca/
GS41yogay1_u:10.17cd: śatror balaṃ hanti gatas tṛtīye caturthago bandhubhayaṃ parebhyaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:10.18ab: nārthasya siddhiḥ sutage 'rkaputre ripūn ripusthe sṛjayaty ayatnāt/
GS41yogay1_u:10.19ab: dharme na dharmaṃ labhate sukhañ ca yānāvṛtiṃ karmaphalaṃ ca svasthe/
GS41yogay1_u:10.19cd: ekādaśasthe jayavittalābhān mande 'ntyage nārtham upaiti yātā//
GS41yogay1_u:10.22ab: ekīyapakṣe 'pi hi kaiścid ukto bhṛguḥ śubho 'ntyātmajalābhavarjam/
GS41yogay1_u:11.1ab: saumyāsaumyeṣv etal lagnādstheṣu yat phalaṃ proktam/
GS41yogay1_u:11.2ab: horāvido jagur idaṃ sutāv abalo daśādhipāriś ca/
GS41yogay1_u:11.3ab: sāmprataṃ śubhadaḥ sutau balanvito yo daśādhi(pa)mitraṃ ca/
GS41yogay1_u:11.5cd: pāpāṃ copacayasthaṃ na vilagne tatra ca ślokau//
GS41yogay1_u:11.8ab: tac ca viruddhaṃ teṣāṃ katham anyadaśāsu dāsyate svaphalam/
GS41yogay1_u:11.8cd: evaṃ phalasya nāśo vrajati sarvasya phalali(lī)psoḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:11.9ab: tasmān naikānto 'yaṃ jātakam avalokya nirdiśet sadasat/
GS41yogay1_u:11.9cd: ślokau vṛttaṃ bhedaṃ prāha maṇittho vasiṣṭhaś ca//
GS41yogay1_u:11.10ab: rakṣakā vardhakāś caiva ye syur janmani nāyakāḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:11.10cd: tān pāpān api niḥśaṅko yātrālagneṣu yojayet//
GS41yogay1_u:11.11cd: tān sarvān avalokyaiva prayāṇeṣv api yojayet//
GS41yogay1_u:11.12ab: horāgataḥ svabhavane yadi sūryaputro meṣopago 'vanisutaḥ svagṛhe śaśāṅkaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:11.12cd: śukras tulādharagato mithune budhaś ca siṃhe ravir yadi ca pārthivajanma vidyāt//
GS41yogay1_u:11.13cd: te sarve nānākhyā krūrāḥ saumyaiḥ samāścintyāḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:11.14ab: yo yasya daśamagṛhagaḥ sa tasya vaśyas tu bhavati niyamena/
GS41yogay1_u:11.14cd: yaś cātha paṇapharasthaḥ sa bhavati rakṣopagas tadvat//
GS41yogay1_u:11.16ab: janmeśvaralagnapayor yaḥ śatrur lagnagaḥ sa saumyo 'pi/
GS41yogay1_u:11.16cd: kurute dehavipattiṃ krūro 'pi śubhaṃ tayor mitram//
GS41yogay1_u:11.17ab: bhaven na yaḥ kārakatānasaṃjñaḥ svajanmalagnādhipayoḥ śubho 'pi/
GS41yogay1_u:11.17cd: karoti lagnopagataḥ sa yātur bhayaṃ vināśaṃ ca bahuprakāram//
GS41yogay1_u:11.18cd: tasmāt praytnād idm eva cintyaṃ yiyāsatāṃ kārakatānayātam//
GS41yogay1_u:11.19ab: eko 'pi vakropagato narāṇāṃ śubho 'śubho vāpi catuṣṭayasthaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:11.28a: yo 'staṃ yāty udayaṃ vā dakṣiṇamārgasthitaḥ sahastrāṃśoḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:11.29a: tigmakarasyottarato darśanam āyāti yo graho 'staṃ vā/
GS41yogay1_u:11.29b: madhye tu vā sa lagne yātuḥ kusumāmbarāśanadaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:11.30b: vikṛtistho galnagato na śubhaḥ śubhadaḥ svabhavanasthaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:11.31a: yāmye tamo jñaḥ śravaṇe ravis tu jāto viśākhāsu sitaś ca puṣye/
GS41yogay1_u:11.33b: svayam arir upaiti vaśyaṃ praṇataśirāḥ sārvabhaumo 'pi//
GS41yogay1_u:11.34a: pakeśvarārilagne varge vā tasya bhūpatir gacchan/
GS41yogay1_u:11.36a: yātrāphalaṃ caturthe jāmitre śatravaḥ pramādaś ca/
GS41yogay1_u:11.37a: satyācāryasya mate vibalaḥ śastaḥ śaśī prayāṇeṣu/
GS41yogay1_u:11.37b: digvīryonaḥ kevalam induḥ śasta iti jagur anye//
GS41yogay1_u:11.38a: yad eva yasyodayasaṃsthitasya phalaṃ prayāṇe sadasat pradiṣṭam/
GS41yogay1_u:11.38b: tad eva tasyākhilam ahni yātur grahasya varge ca chap.12 miśraka
GS41yogay1_u:12.1ab: vyasanaṃ prāpno(ti) mahad vyatipāte nirgato 'thavā mṛtyum/
GS41yogay1_u:12.5ab: na sadṛśadaśo 'bhiyojyaḥ sandhānaṃ tena bhūpater vyāsam/
GS41yogay1_u:12.9ab: upacayakartur vrajed diśaṃ balavati kaṇṭakage ca dikpatau/
GS41yogay1_u:12.9cd: manasāpi na digbalānvite digadhipatau ca lalāṭasaṃsthite//
GS41yogay1_u:12.10cd: krūrāv api nityam eva tau saumyair eva samāv udāhṛtau//
GS41yogay1_u:12.12ab: parasparaṃ saurikujau ravīndū trikoṇagau bhārgavalohitau ca/
GS41yogay1_u:12.12cd: phalaṃ yad uktaṃ tad aśeṣam eva vināśya paścāt svadiśaṃ nayantām//
GS41yogay1_u:12.13ab: ripudivaso yasya bhavet saumyo 'pi sa lagnago na śubhadātā/
GS41yogay1_u:12.15cd: bhānau kulīrajhaṣavṛścikage 'tidīrghā śastas tu devalamate 'dhvani pṛṣṭhato 'rkaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:12.19cd: śukre pravasan narer vaśaṃ yāti budhe ca vilomasaṃsthite//
GS41yogay1_u:12.20ab: anulo(ma)gate śaśāṅkaje śukre caivam api vyavasthite/
GS41yogay1_u:12.21ab: ākrandasārī dinamadhyago 'rkaḥ pauraḥ purastād aparatra yāyī/
GS41yogay1_u:12.21cd: ākranda indur gurumandasaumyāḥ paurāḥ smṛtā yāyina ity ato 'nye//
GS41yogay1_u:12.22cd: satyaṃ tathā kiṃ tu viśeṣam āhus te bhūpateḥ satphaladā jigīṣoḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:12.23ab: dṛṣṭe sāmnāṃ karmaniṣṭaṃ surārau vaitālīyaṃ pādadambhau ca hitvā/
GS41yogay1_u:12.23cd: śasto rāhus tryāyakarmopayāto yātavyaś cāsannatāgaś ca ketuḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:12.24a: sāmnāṃ śukrabṛhaspatī dinakaro vakraś ca daṇḍeśvarau
GS41yogay1_u:12.25cd: athāyanena yugapad ekasaṃsthayor dyunaktayo raviśaśinor vrajet tadā//E25 chap.13 dehaspandana
GS41yogay1_u:13.3ab: yoṣitsaukhyaṃ gaṇḍe dṛkcaramādhaś ca saṅgare vijayaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:13.3cd: śravaṇe ca hitaśravaṇaṃ nāsāyāṃ prītisaukhyaṃ ca//
GS41yogay1_u:13.5ab: haste 'rthāptiḥ pṛṣṭhe parājayo vakṣasi smṛto vijayaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:13.5cd: prītyutpattiḥ pārśve stane tv apūrvā viṣayalabdhiḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:13.8ab: pṛṣṭhata ūrvor doṣaḥ purataś calane tu śacivahitalabdhiḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:13.8cd: pracalati ca jānusandhāv arisandhānaṃ balavad uktam//
GS41yogay1_u:13.10cd: kaṇḍūyanaṃ narapater dakṣiṇapāṇau jayāyaiti//E10 chap.14 cittaśuddhir
GS41yogay1_u:14.1cd: ripunidhanapraṇidhānaṃ prati bhavataḥ kiṃ manaḥ kurute//
GS41yogay1_u:14.2ab: brūyāt sa cen mama manaḥ protsahate harṣayet tataś caivam/
GS41yogay1_u:14.3cd: ekataś ca manaśśuddhis tad dhi śuddhaṃ jayāvaham//
GS41yogay1_u:14.4ab: kiyac ciraṃ na labhyeta nimittaṃ gamanānugam/
GS41yogay1_u:14.4cd: na tv eva tu mano 'narthaṃ cireṇāpy anumanyate//
GS41yogay1_u:14.5cd: tejo hy etac charīrasthaṃ trikālaphaladaṃ nṛṇām//
GS41yogay1_u:14.6cd: tasmāt sarvātmanā yātur anumeyaṃ sadā manaḥ//E6 chap.15 guhyakānuṣṭhāna
GS41yogay1_u:15.1cd: tryaham atha vijayasnānaṃ gṛhayajñaṃ saptame divase//
GS41yogay1_u:15.4ab: ardhaniśāyām udayati saumye vakre 'thavā tadaṃśe vā/
GS41yogay1_u:15.4cd: dadyād baliṃ daśasv apy āśāsu purohitaḥ kramaśaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:15.9ab: evam uktvā tatas tv arghyaṃ pramathebhyaḥ pradāpayet/
GS41yogay1_u:15.11ab: ye syur bhūtagaṇās tebhyo namo 'stv ity anuyāntu ca/
GS41yogay1_u:15.13ab: nivṛttayātraḥ punar apy ahaṃ hi vo vijitya śatrūn bhavatāṃ prasādataḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:15.13cd: ato viśiṣṭaṃ bahuvittam uttamaṃ baliṃ kariṣye vidhinopapāditam//
GS41yogay1_u:15.14ab: anarcitā ye nṛpatiṃ savāhanaṃ vināśayanti kṣapayanti vā camūn/
GS41yogay1_u:15.14cd: supūjitāḥ siddhikarā bhavanti te pravādhakāḥ śatrugaṇasya cāhave//
GS41yogay1_u:16.2ab: abhyarcya mantrais tu purohitas tān adhaś ca tasyāṃ bhuvi saṃskṛtāyām/
GS41yogay1_u:16.2cd: darbhais tu kṛtvāstaram akṣatais ca kiret samantāt sitasarṣapaiś ca//
GS41yogay1_u:16.3ab: brāhmīṃ sadūrvām atha nāgapuṣpīṃ kṛtvopadhānaṃ śirasi kṣitīśaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:16.3cd: pūrṇān ghaṭān puṣpaphalābhidhānān āśāsu kuryāc caturaḥ krameṇa//
GS41yogay1_u:16.4ab: yaj jāgrato dūram upaiti daivam āvartya mantrāṃ kramaśas trir etam/
GS41yogay1_u:16.4cd: laghv ekabhug dakṣiṇapārśvaśāyī svapnaṃ parīkṣeta yathopadeśam//
GS41yogay1_u:16.7cd: niśānte paśyati svapnaṃ śubhaṃ vā yadi vā 'śubham//
GS41yogay1_u:16.8ab: gataiṣyajātyantarasattvasaṅgaiḥ svapne 'py anūke gatije ca nityam/
GS41yogay1_u:16.11ab: daśāsu coktaṃ grahapākajātaṃ cintā tu dṛṣā tu yathā tathaiva/
GS41yogay1_u:16.12cd: dyudṛṣṭapūrvāḥ kathitāś ca tadvad anyatra loke kathitā viśeṣāḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:16.14c: bandho vā nigale grasec ca dahanaṃ nānāśirobāhutā
GS41yogay1_u:16.14d: chatraṃ vā dvirado 'bhiṣicya bibhṛyād divyo 'thavā brāhmaṇaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:16.15d: viśati yadi vā suśliṣṭāṅgī tanuṃ pravarāṅganā//
GS41yogay1_u:16.17b: daraṇam api ca mūrdhnaḥ sapta pañca tridhā vā/
GS41yogay1_u:16.20cd: abhaya jaya ca bhuṃkṣva ceti śabdāḥ pariṇatarājyaphalapradāḥ pradiṣṭāḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:16.21cd: (tada)nūkam iti proktam iha paścāt karoti yat//
GS41yogay1_u:16.23a: kāminyāṃ dhanalabdhir ambutaraṇe śokasya nāśo bhaved
GS41yogay1_u:16.23b: dharṣo roditaśocitādiṣu tathā dāhe vivṛddhir matā/
GS41yogay1_u:16.23d: svapne tan niyamād bhavaty avitathaṃ neṣṭaṃ śubhaṃ vā phalam//
GS41yogay1_u:16.28ab: svadravyanāśaḥ suhṛdāṃ viyogaśchedaś ca pāṇyoḥ kamalāpahāraḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:16.29ab: mitrasyāptiḥ syādvikośāsilābhe vaśyaṃ gacched bhūpateḥ śāsanāptau/
GS41yogay1_u:16.29cd: sarpe karṇau nāsikāṃ vā praviṣṭe tacchedaḥ syād veṣṭane cāśu bandhaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:16.30ab: ādye varṣād vatsarārdhād dvitīye yāme pāko varṣapādāt tṛtīye/
GS41yogay1_u:16.30cd: māsāt pākaḥ śarvarīpaścimāṃśe sadyaḥ pāko govisarge ca dṛṣṭe//
GS41yogay1_u:16.31ab: dṛṣṭvā svapnaṃ śobhanaṃ neha supyāt paścād dṛṣṭo yaḥ sa pākaṃ vidhatte/
GS41yogay1_u:16.31cd: śaṃsediṣṭaṃ tatra sādhudvijebhyas te tvāśibhiḥ pūjayeyur narendram//
GS41yogay1_u:16.32a: bhūyaḥ prasvapanaṃ na cāsya kathanaṃ gaṅgābhiṣeko japaḥ
GS41yogay1_u:16.32d: puṇyaṃ bhāratakīrtanaṃ ca kathitaṃ duḥsvapnavicchittaye//E32 chap.17 vijayasnāna
GS41yogay1_u:17.5ab: tanmadhye brāhmī brahmā sāma dūrvāgraśaṃkhapuṣpāḥ syuḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:17.6ab: tasya grahānulomaṃ kālaṃ kecij jagur niṣeveta/
GS41yogay1_u:17.9ab: śvetasya babhror athavā vṛṣasya carmāstare vyāghramṛgendrayor vā/
GS41yogay1_u:17.9cd: tatsthasya kuryān manujeśvarasya jayābhiṣekaṃ vidhivat purodhāḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:17.10ab: kramān mahīrūpyasuvarṇakumbhaiḥ kṣīrasya dadhno haviṣaś ca pūrṇaiḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:17.10cd: snāyāc ca toyaiḥ saha saptamṛdbhiḥ paścāc ca sarvauṣadhigandhatoyaiḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:17.12ab: dvātriṃśatiṃ ṣoḍaśa vāthavāṣṭau ghaṭapramāṇaṃ munibhiḥ pradiṣṭam/
GS41yogay1_u:17.12cd: snātas tv alaṅkāram apāsya pūrvaṃ navaṃ vidadhyād dvijamantrapūrtam//
GS41yogay1_u:17.14cd: vāme 'sya pārśve 'grata āsthito vā pratīpapātaṃ juhuyād dhutāśam//
GS41yogay1_u:17.15cd: āsevya sarvāṇi yathopadeśaṃ bhaktyā dvijān svasti ca vācayitvā//
GS41yogay1_u:17.16ab: saumyena yāyāt phalapuṣpapāṇir dvāreṇa paśyen na ca pauruhūtam/
GS41yogay1_u:17.16cd: prāg uddhared dakṣiṇapādam evaṃ kurvan nṛpaḥ sarvaripūn chap.18 grahayajña
GS41yogay1_u:18.1ab: grahayajñam ato vakṣye tatra nimittāni lakṣayed vedyām/[cited in bs 43.14]
GS41yogay1_u:18.3cd: ā kṛṣṇeti ca mantro raktā gandhāḥ sahāguraṇāḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:18.6ab: nyagrodhāt sruksamidhaḥ sphaṭikād arcā ca śitagoḥ kāryā/
GS41yogay1_u:18.8cd: rajataśaphaviṣāṇāṃ kṣīriṇīṃ ca tu himāṃśum uddiśya//(candraḥ)
GS41yogay1_u:18.9ab: raktakaravīrasamidho raktā gandhāś ca candanāt pratimā/
GS41yogay1_u:18.11cd: sruksamidhaś ca madhūkād atha vā cāndrer apāmārgāt//
GS41yogay1_u:18.17ab: annāt parisrutādyo mantraḥ strīkarkaśās tv alaṅkārāḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:18.21cd: mantraś ca kayā naścitrapūrvako 'rcā ca nāgamayī//
GS41yogay1_u:18.22cd: viprebhya iti yad anyat tat sarvaṃ sūryaputrasamam//(rāhuḥ)
GS41yogay1_u:18.23ab: ketoḥ kāṃsyapratimā ketuṃ kṛṇvann na ketave mantraḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:18.24cd: praharaṇaphalgudravyāṇi caivaṃ ketuṃ samuddiśya//(ketuḥ)E24 chap.19 agnilakṣaṇa
GS41yogay1_u:19.1ab: kṛtvaivaṃ grahapūjām ṛcā tataś cāgniliṅgayā juhuyāt/
GS41yogay1_u:19.2ab: tato 'pratirathaṃ kṛtsnaṃ yātrāliṅgaṃ ca yad bhavet/
GS41yogay1_u:19.4ab: bhūta bhūteti ca gaṇaṃ yatte candras tathaiva ca/
GS41yogay1_u:19.4cd: aindro gaṇas tathā cāndro mantrāśīḥsūktam eva ca//
GS41yogay1_u:19.5ab: bhūyo bhūyas tathā jvālāṃ saṃspṛśyātha purohitaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:19.5cd: spṛśec ca nṛpatiṃ mantrair uccair brūyāt punaḥ punaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:19.6ab: cakṣurdaḥ prāṇadaś cāpi varcodaś ca bhava prabho/
GS41yogay1_u:19.7ab: śātravāṇāṃ tathā rājāpy anādhṛṣyo bhavaty ayam/
GS41yogay1_u:19.7cd: hūyamāne nimittāni vakṣyāmy aham ataḥ param//
GS41yogay1_u:19.8b: dgārādyaṃ ca purodhasaḥ smṛtivipac cāniṣṭam anyac chubham/
GS41yogay1_u:19.8d: tan neṣṭaṃ śubham anyathopakaraṇaṃ dravyāṇy anūnāni ca//
GS41yogay1_u:19.9a: utthāya svayam ujjvalārcir analaḥ svāhāvasāne havir
GS41yogay1_u:19.9b: bhukte dehasukhaḥ pradakṣiṇagatiḥ snigdho mahān saṃhataḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:19.10d: savye 'ṅge nṛpatiṃ dahann atihitaḥ śeṣaṃ ca lokād vadet//E10 chap.20 prasthānika
GS41yogay1_u:20.1ab: vrajed digīśaṃ hṛdaye niveśya yathendra mainryām aparāś ca tadvat/
GS41yogay1_u:20.3cd: dvātriṃśataṃ samupagamya padāni bhūmau prāgādi nāgarathavājinraiḥ prayāyāt//E3 chap.21 gajalakṣaṇeṅgita
GS41yogay1_u:21.3ab: vistīrṇakarṇahanunābhilalāṭaguhyāḥ kūrmonnatair [Bṣ 66.7b kūrmonnata-] dvinavaviṃśatibhir nakhaiś ca/ sajalāmbhodaninādavṛṃhiṇaḥ [Bṣ 66.7d dhanyāḥ sugandhimadapuṣkaramārutāś ca]/
GS41yogay1_u:21.6cd: garbhiṇīṃ ca nṛpatiḥ paradeśaṃ prāpayed ativirūpaphalās te//
GS41yogay1_u:21.8ab: pārthivopakaraṇākṛtiṃ yadā cihnam udvahati kalpite rade/
GS41yogay1_u:21.9ab: dakṣiṇe śubham atīva śobhanaṃ pāpam apy ativirūpam anyataḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:21.14ab: skhalitagatir akasmāt trastakarṇo 'tidīnaḥ śvasiti mṛdu sudīrghaṃ nyastahastaḥ
GS41yogay1_u:21.14cd: drutamukulitadṛṣṭiḥ svapnaśīlo vilomo bhayakṛd ahitabhakṣī naikaśo 'sṛcchakṛtkṛt//
GS41yogay1_u:21.15b: yāyād yātrānulomaṃ tvaritapadagatir vaktram unnāmya coccaiḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:21.15c: kakṣāsannāhakāle janayati ca muhuḥ śīkaraṃ vṛṃhitaṃ vā
GS41yogay1_u:21.15d: tatkālaṃ vā madāptir jayakṛd atha radaṃ veṣṭayan dakṣiṇaṃ chap.22 vājilakṣaṇeṅgita
GS41yogay1_u:22.7ab: prākphalatulyaṃ pṛṣṭhe jaghane vāleṣu caiva nirdiṣṭam/
GS41yogay1_u:22.11ab: vijayāya sarvaidaiva hi suśuklaśukavarṇayor jvalanam eṣu/
GS41yogay1_u:22.11cd: evaṃ ca yathāsambhavam anyeṣv api vāhaneṣu phalam//
GS41yogay1_u:22.17ab: sajṛmbhaṇaṃ pṛṣṭhavidhūnanaṃ ca vālaprakāras tv asakṛl lilikṣoḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:22.18cd: niśāsu cānyonyavirodhanaṣṭanidrās turaṅgā na śivāya bhartuḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:22.19ab: jaṃghe liṃhannavraṇaromapaṅke pādau ca saṃhṛṣṭatanur jayāya/
GS41yogay1_u:22.19cd: viparyayaḥ paścimayoḥ prayatnāt svayaṃ tu yātrābhimukho niyamya//
GS41yogay1_u:22.20ab: muhurmuhur mūtraśakṛt karoti na tāḍyāmāno 'py anulomayāyī/
GS41yogay1_u:22.20cd: akāryabhīto 'śruvilocanaś ca śivaṃ na bhartus turago vidhatte//
GS41yogay1_u:22.21ab: ārohati kṣitipatau vinayopapanno yātrānugo 'nyaturagaṃ pratiheṣitaś ca/
GS41yogay1_u:22.21cd: vaktreṇa vā spṛśati dakṣiṇam ātmapārśvaṃ yo 'śvaḥ sa bhartur acirāt pratanoti chap.23 śakunaśubhāśubha
GS41yogay1_u:23.1ab: anyajanmāntarakṛtaṃ puṃsāṃ karma [Bṣ 85.5b karma puṃsāṃ] śubhāśubham/
GS41yogay1_u:23.1cd: yat tasya śukunaḥ pākaṃ nivedayati gacchatām//
GS41yogay1_u:23.3ab: pṛthagjāty anavasthānād eṣāṃ vyaktir na labhyate [Bṣ85.7d lakṣyate]/
GS41yogay1_u:23.7ab: pathyātmānaṃ nṛpaṃ sainye pure coddiśya devatām/
GS41yogay1_u:23.7cd: sārthe prdhānaṃ sāmye tu [Bṣ 85.11d syāj] jātividyāvayodhikam//
GS41yogay1_u:23.9ab: tatpañcamadiśāṃ tulyaṃ phalaṃ [Bṣ 85.13b śubhaṃ] traikālyam ādiśet/
GS41yogay1_u:23.10cd: sthānavṛdhyupaghātāś ca tadvad brūyāt phalaṃ budhaḥ [Bṣ 85.14d punaḥ]//
GS41yogay1_u:23.15cd: svabhūmāv anulomāś ca tadūnāḥ syur vivarjitāḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:23.16cd: balinaḥ siṃhanādāś ca kūṭapūrī ca pūrvataḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:23.20cd: divācaro na śarvaryāṃ na ca naktaṃcaro divā//
GS41yogay1_u:23.21cd: āpagāntaritā mattā na grāhyāḥ śakunāḥ kvacit//
GS41yogay1_u:23.23ab: na tu bhrādrapade grāhyāḥ sūkarāś ca [Bṣ 85.27b sva] vṛkādaya/
GS41yogay1_u:23.24cd: hemante niṣphalā jñeyā bālāḥ sarve vimānuṣāḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:23.28cd: dhanavānīkṣaṇīkaś ca mālākāras tataḥ param [Bṣ 85.23d paraṃ tataḥ]//
GS41yogay1_u:23.29ab: vaiṣṇavaś carakaś caiva vājinām rakṣaṇe rataḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:23.30ab: rājā kumāro netā ca dūtaḥ śreṣṭhī caro dvijaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:23.31ab: gacchatas tiṣṭhato vāpi diśi yasyāṃ vyavasthitaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:23.35cd: satūryādhvayanāḥ puṃvat strīvad anyā giraḥ śubhāḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:23.36ab: grāmyau madhyamaṣaḍjau tu gāndhāraś ceti śobhanāḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:23.40ab: chitkaraḥ [Bṣ 85.44a chikkaraḥ] kūṭapūrī ca pirilī(?) cāhni dakṣiṇāḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:23.41ab: śreṣṭhe hayasite prācyāṃ śavamāṃse ca dakṣiṇe/
GS41yogay1_u:23.43cd: yānavyatyastagā grāhyā viśeṣaś cātra kathyate [Bṣ 85.47d vakṣyate]//
GS41yogay1_u:23.45cd: sarva eva viparyasthā grāhyāḥ sārtheṣu yoṣitām//
GS41yogay1_u:23.47ab: vāmadakṣiṇagau śastau yau tu tāv agrapṛṣṭhagau/
GS41yogay1_u:23.49ab: kecit tu śakunadvāram icchanty ubhayataḥ sthitaiḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:23.50ab: visarjayati yady eka ekaś ca pratiṣedhati/
GS41yogay1_u:23.50cd: sa virodho 'śubho yātur grāhyo vā balavattaraḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:23.51ab: pūrvaṃ prāveśiko bhūtvā punaḥ prāsthāniko bhavet/
GS41yogay1_u:23.52ab: visṛjya śakunaḥ pūrvaṃ sa eva niruṇaddhi cet/
GS41yogay1_u:23.52cd: prāha yātur arer mṛtyuṃ samaraṃ [Bṣ 85.56d ḍamaraṃ] rogam eva ca//
GS41yogay1_u:23.53cd: ārambhe śakuno dīpto vṛṣānte [Bṣ 85.57d varṣāntas] tadbhayaṃkaraḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:23.57cd: kurvanti śakunā dīptāḥ śāntā yāpyaphalās tu te//
GS41yogay1_u:23.58cd: sthānāt krośan [Bṣ 85.62c ruvan] vrajed yātrāṃ śaṃsate tv anyathāgamam//
GS41yogay1_u:23.59cd: uccam ādau dhvaniṃ [Bṣ 85.63c svaraṃ] kṛtvā nīcaṃ paścāc ca doṣakṛt//
GS41yogay1_u:23.64ab: iṣṭaṃ vā gorasānnaṃ vā bhāradvājasya darśane/
GS41yogay1_u:23.66ab: anulomo vṛṣo nardan dhanyo gaur mahiṣas tathā/
GS41yogay1_u:23.67ab: ulūkī vāmataḥ kṣemyā dakṣiṇena ca kokilā/
GS41yogay1_u:23.67cd: śarkariś ca (?) mayūraś ca śasyate dakṣiṇe sadā//
GS41yogay1_u:23.68ab: vṛkāḥ śṛgālāḥ śārdūlā viḍālā gardabhāḥ śunaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:24.2ab: pūrvodīcyoḥ śivā śastā śāntā sarvatra pūjitā/
GS41yogay1_u:24.3ab: [rājā kumāro netā ca dūtaḥ śreṣṭhī caro dvijaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:24.4cd: pure sainye 'pasavyā ca kaṣṭā pūrvonmukhā śivā//
GS41yogay1_u:24.5ab: yāhīty agnibhayaṃ śāsti ṭāṭeti mṛticoditā [Bṣ 89.6b mṛtavedikā]/
GS41yogay1_u:24.6ab: naiva dāruṇatām eke svajvālāyāḥ [Bṣ 89.7b sajvālāyāḥ] pracakṣate/
GS41yogay1_u:24.6cd: arkādyanalavat tasyā vaktrāj jvālā svabhāvataḥ [Bṣ 89.7d vaktraṃ lālāsvabhāvataḥ]//
GS41yogay1_u:24.7cd: vāruṇyābhirutā [Bṣ 89.8c anurutā] saiva saṃsate salile mṛtim//
GS41yogay1_u:24.8cd: kṣobhāt pradhānabhedaś ca vāhanānām asampadaḥ [Bṣ 89.9d ca sampadaḥ]/
GS41yogay1_u:24.9ab: phalam ā saptamād etad agrāhyaṃ parato rute/
GS41yogay1_u:24.9cd: yāmyāyāṃ tadviparyastaṃ phalaṃ ṣaṭpañcamād rute [Bṣ 89.10d ṛte]//
GS41yogay1_u:24.10ab: yā romāṃcaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ śakṛnmūtraṃ ca vājinām/
GS41yogay1_u:24.10cd: rāvāt trāsaṃ ca janayet sā śivā na śivapradā//
GS41yogay1_u:24.11cd: yā śivā sā śivaṃ sainye pure vā saṃprayacchati//E11 chap.25 vāyaseṅgita
GS41yogay1_u:25.1ab: śasto nīḍas tu vaiśākhe padape nirupadrave/
GS41yogay1_u:25.4ab: hared upanayed vāpi yad dravyaṃ vāyaso 'grataḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:25.5ab: raktadravyaṃ pradagdhaṃ vā nyasan gehe 'gnidaḥ smṛtaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:25.7cd: vargataś cābhighātaḥ syād ripuvṛddhiś ca nirbhayaiḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:25.8cd: mṛtyuṃ tatsvāmino brūyāt pūjā syāt tatprapūjane//
GS41yogay1_u:25.13ab: viruvan cāgrataḥ pakṣe dhūnvan dhvāṃkṣo bhayapradaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:25.13cd: pratyurasy upasarpan ca saṃsparśan ca tathā bhavet//
GS41yogay1_u:25.15cd: vāyasaḥ śasyate yātus tūṣṇībhūto ruvann api//
GS41yogay1_u:25.16cd: annadaḥ parṇavicchedī pānado jalakuṭṭanāt//E16 chap.26 śveṅgita
GS41yogay1_u:26.1cd: sabhayo vicaran vinā nimittaṃ na śubhaś cābhimukho bhaṣan likhan gām//
GS41yogay1_u:26.2ab: uccair bhaṣaṇaṃ samāgatānāṃ dīnaṃ vābhirutaṃ raviṃ nirīkṣya/
GS41yogay1_u:26.2cd: saṃgharadanajṛmbhaṇe ca neṣṭe prasthāneṣu tathā vidhūnanaṃ ca//
GS41yogay1_u:26.3ab: pūrṇāsyatvaṃ ghrāyakatvaṃ ca yātuḥ prādakṣiṇyaṃ maithunaṃ cānulomam/
GS41yogay1_u:26.3cd: yātrākāle sārameyasya śastaṃ padbhyāṃ mūrdhanaḥ svasya kaṇḍūyanaṃ ca//E3 chap.27 maṅgalāmaṅgala
GS41yogay1_u:27.4ab: svayam atha racitāny ayatnato vā yadi kathitāni bhavanti maṅgalāni/
GS41yogay1_u:27.4cd: sa jayati sakalāṃ tato dharitrīṃ grahaṇadṛgālabhanaśrutair upāsya//
GS41yogay1_u:27.6cd: pracurakusumatoyaśāntareṇuṃ surabhisuveṣajanaṃ vrajec ca mārgam//E6 chap.28 dhvajātapatrādiśakuna
GS41yogay1_u:28.1cd: uttiṣṭhato vāmbaram eti saṅgaṃ patec ca vā tannṛpateḥ kṣayāya/
GS41yogay1_u:28.2cd: prāyo bale netari vā nṛpe vā jānīta rājño bhayakāraṇaṃ tat//
GS41yogay1_u:28.3cd: neṣṭāni śabdāś ca tathaiva yātur āgacchatiṣṭhapraviśasthirādyāḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:28.4ab: kāryam tu mūlaśakune 'nyataraje tadahni vidyāt phalaṃ niyatam evam ime vicintyāḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:28.4cd: prārambhayānasamaye tu tathā praveśe grāhyaṃ kṣutam na śubhadaṃ kvacid apy uśanti//
GS41yogay1_u:28.5a: krośād ūrdhvaṃ śakunavirutaṃ niṣphalaṃ prāhur eke
GS41yogay1_u:28.5b: tatrāniṣṭe prathamaśukune mānayet paṃca ṣaḍ vā/
GS41yogay1_u:28.5d: pratyāgacchet svabhavanam ato yady aniṣṭas tṛtīyaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:28.6ab: cakre varāhamihiraḥ śakunopadeśam uddeśato munimatāny avalokya samyak/
GS41yogay1_u:28.6cd: yad granthavistarabhayād avijānato vā noktaṃ tad anyakathitād api cintanīyam//E6 chap.29 niveśa
GS41yogay1_u:29.1ab: snigdhā sthirā surabhigulmalatā sugandhā śastā pradakṣiṇajalā ca nivāsabhūmiḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:29.2cd: hatvā paśuṃ ripugṛhākṛtam udyame ca prāsyātha vānnamayam asya vidhāya rūpam//
GS41yogay1_u:29.4ab: tac cāyuktam iti prāhur horāśāstravido janāḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:30.2ab: visrambhahā krodhavaśo nṛśaṃsaḥ kṣudraḥ pramādī na bahuśrutaś ca/
GS41yogay1_u:30.2cd: divyāntarikṣakṣitijair vikārair nipīḍito yaḥ sa tu daivahīnaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:30.3cd: tarur ghunair jagdha ivāttavīryo mahān api kṣipram upaiti bhaṅgam//E3 chap.31 senāvātavṛṣṭyulkābhūgarjitasandhyā
GS41yogay1_u:31.1cd: sotpātaprakṛtiviparyayānuyātā śokārtā ripuvaśam āśu yāti senā//
GS41yogay1_u:31.2ab: saṃgrāme vayam amaradvijaprasādāj jyoṣyāmo ripubalam āśv asaṃśayena/
GS41yogay1_u:31.2cd: yasyaivaṃ bhavati bale janapravādaḥ so 'lpo 'pi pracurabalaṃ ripuṃ nihanti//
GS41yogay1_u:31.4cd: jayadam ubhayapārśvādhiṣṭhitaṃ pṛṣṭhato vā na śubhakaram ato 'nyad yānakāle nṛbhartuḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:31.5cd: vajramucaḥ kṣatajāśmamuco vā balabhayam āśu janāḥ kathayanti//
GS41yogay1_u:31.6ab: bhṛśaṃ kṣaranto rudhirāruṇā vā saśakracāpā khararūkṣanādāḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:31.7d: kṣc coṣṇāyāṃ bhavati na cirād ambudāyāṃ vināśaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:31.9ab: cāpam aindram anulomam akhaṇḍaṃ projjvalaṃ bahulam āyatam iṣṭam/
GS41yogay1_u:31.10ab: tanvī pralambā vijayāya dīrghā taḍid ghanasphūrjathuvarjitā ca/
GS41yogay1_u:31.11ab: lagne 'rkendū nighnatī śasti paurān ulkā hanyād yātupaurān grahāś ca/
GS41yogay1_u:31.11cd: yātuḥ śastā sambhṛtā vā dhruvarkṣe neṣṭāto 'nyā dhūminī śyāvaraktā//
GS41yogay1_u:31.12cd: velā kramaśo dināditaḥ kāṣṭhāyāṃ ca sa yatra bhūsvanaś ca//
GS41yogay1_u:31.13ab: śastā śāntadvijamṛgaghuṣṭā sandhyā snigdhā mṛduṣavanā ca/
GS41yogay1_u:31.13cd: pāṃśudhvastā janapadanāśaṃ dhatte rūkṣā rudhiranibhā vā//E13 chap.32 utpāta
GS41yogay1_u:32.2cd: nīhāraḥ pāṃśupātaś ca hitaḥ snigdhaḥ pradakṣiṇaḥ//
GS41yogay1_u:32.3cd: baleśaṃ yuvarājaṃ ca purohitam iti kramāt//
GS41yogay1_u:32.4cd: pradakṣiṇaṃ tu yātrāyāṃ jayadaṃ neṣṭam anyathā//
GS41yogay1_u:32.5cd: śvabhronnate vadho rājño jayāya vyatyayena ca//
GS41yogay1_u:32.6ab: ghṛtāmbupayasāṃ srāve cyute vṛkṣāc ca tatkṣayaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:32.6cd: taile ca nāśo mukhyānāṃ rakte śastrakṛtaṃ bhayam//
GS41yogay1_u:32.7ab: madyena tu mitho bhedo rugbhayaṃ dadhinisrave/
GS41yogay1_u:32.9cd: dinolkāyāṃ ca pīḍyante janā bhūpatibhiḥ saha//
GS41yogay1_u:32.10ab: saptāhaṃ santatāny ato vṛṣṭir hanyān narādhipam/
GS41yogay1_u:32.10cd: anagnijvalane puṃsāṃ vyādhir āśv eva jāyate//
GS41yogay1_u:32.13cd: gadane cāpi deśasya nāśaṃ māsatrayād vadet//
GS41yogay1_u:32.17ab: niśi suracāpaṃ sitavarṇādyaṃ janayati pīḍāṃ dvijapūrvāṇām/
GS41yogay1_u:32.17cd: bhavati ca yasyāṃ diśi taddiśyaṃ narapatimukhyaṃ na cirād dhanyāt//
GS41yogay1_u:32.18cd: vibudhapatidhvajatoraṇapātaḥ phalam idam eva karoti chap.33 puradurgālabdho
GS41yogay1_u:33.1c: sarvārambhaphalaprasiddhir udaye rāśau ca kartuḥ śubhe
GS41yogay1_u:33.2ab: krūrodaye tadahani vyatipātayoge rikte tithāv ṛtusamāptiṣu vaidhṛte vā/
GS41yogay1_u:33.2cd: tīkṣṇograbheṣu ca hutāśaviṣābhighātaraudrāṇi siddhim upayāny asite ca pakṣe//
GS41yogay1_u:33.3cd: sūryendvoḥ pariveṣakhaṇḍam athavā dṛśyeta yasyāṃ diśi/
GS41yogay1_u:33.4cd: sainye vāpi yato viśanti hi tataḥ śastroḥ puraṃ ghātayet//
GS41yogay1_u:33.5ab: pātālarkṣe rāhuketvoḥ pure 'res toyocchittiḥ sālapātaś ca kāryaḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:33.5cd: jāmitrasthe bhūmije 'syāṃśake vā putreṇendor vīkṣite 'gniḥ pradeyaḥ//E5 chap.34 jayottara
GS41yogay1_u:34.1cd: yuddhānte mṛgaśakunaiś ca dīptanādair no bhadraṃ bhavati jaye 'pi pārthivasya//
GS41yogay1_u:34.3a: yadānyad api vaikṛtaṃ na vijayāvasāne bhavet
GS41yogay1_u:34.3b: tadā sukham akaṇṭakaṃ nṛpatir atti deśaṃ ripoḥ/
GS41yogay1_u:34.3c: udvāham akālotsavam abhiṣekaṃ cātmajasya yaḥ kṛtvā/
GS41yogay1_u:34.4c: vigajaturagaśastrānnārtibhītāṃś ca hanyāc BY_34.4d/.chubhatithidivasarkṣe hṛṣṭasainyo vaśec ca//
GS41yogay1_u:34.6ab: iti manujapatir yathopadeśaṃ bhagaṇavidāṃ prakaroti yo vacāṃsi/
GS41yogay1_u:34.6cd: sa sakalanṛpamaṇḍalādhipatyaṃ vrajati diviva purandaro 'cireṇa//E6 End of Bṛhadyātrā
